'''''Vagrant Havoc''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
#Defeat the Vagrants

==Request Details==
===Request from Amano===
{{Quest Description|Vagrants are causing trouble somewhere on Narukami Island. [[Amano]] hopes that someone can help resolve the chaos.}}
Help Needed:<br />
There's always a next time with these riotous Vagrants. What a troublesome lot.<br />
We didn't use to have this many {{Color|buzzword|Vagrants}} on Narukami Island... Forget it. Just chase them off, would you?

==Enemies==
* Wave 1
** {{Enemy|Nobushi: Hitsukeban|x=2}}
** {{Enemy|Nobushi: Jintouban|x=1}}
** {{Enemy|Nobushi: Kikouban|x=1}}
* Wave 2
** {{Enemy|Nobushi: Kikouban|x=3}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* During this request the regular enemies in the area are absent. As soon as it's completed, they will respawn.
** North of [[Court of Flowing Sand]]: [[Nobushi]]
** On the beach west of [[Grand Narukami Shrine]]: {{Enemy|Large Hydro Slime|x=2}}
